body:
Hello @mroeschke! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/conftest.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/conftest.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/core/arrays/datetimes.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_construction.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_construction.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_timezones.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_timezones.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_tools.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tests/indexes/datetimes/test_tools.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/scalar/timestamp/test_timestamp.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tests/scalar/timestamp/test_timestamp.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/scalar/timestamp/test_timezones.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tests/scalar/timestamp/test_timezones.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tseries/frequencies.py`](https://github.com/mroeschke/pandas/blob/069e6e1c16a02e52b8ca106d607e814c8f5211e6/pandas/tseries/frequencies.py) !

looks good. does this add a lot more testing? e.g. now that we are having a bigger tz matrix (and use this fixture a fair amount)
Looking at two, 3.6 travis build, we will go from 36028 tests to 37606 tests (783.49 seconds to 931.50 seconds).
thanks! of course if this does close any existing issues, pls update them.
